___assets.description: Object that enumerates all of the required package assets.

___uris.description: This is a mapping of aliases to HTTP resources. The aliases enumerated here are available during resolution of the marathon.json.mustache file.

___container.description: This is a mapping of aliases to Docker images. The aliases enumerated here are available during resolution of marathon.json.mustache file.

___images.description: Images used by DC/OS to display the package.

___icon-small.description: PNG icon URL, preferably 48 by 48 pixels.

items.description: PNG screen URL, preferably 1024 by 1024 pixels.

___icon-medium.description: PNG icon URL, preferably 128 by 128 pixels.

___icon-large.description: PNG icon URL, preferably 256 by 256 pixels.
